name: 10 Seconds in 10 Seconds
description:
Woof Woof!! :)

10 Seconds in 10 Seconds was created in 4-5 days by a team of 6 in a game jam for university. The prompt for the game jam was "10 Seconds".

Every guest in this restaurant has just ordered seconds, and Dogbert is hungry!

You will have 10 seconds per guest to convince them to give you their seconds. If you run out of time or say the wrong thing then they'll leave. Don't worry though, they all regular this establishment and will return soon after :)

Get 10 seconds to win!

Controls:

W A S D -- Run around the restaurant

E or F -- Jump onto table and start dialogue

Click --  Select dialogue responses

Alt f4 -- End game

Created by:

Pride Mckenzie -- Indie Dev

Allison Stanford -- 2D Art

Harper Strat  -- 2D Art

Della Annabel -- 2D Art

Bertie Nicholas -- 3D Art

Jevon Brandow -- Indie Dev

Programs Used:

-Game made in Unreal Engine 4

-2D art made in Photoshop

-3D art made in Maya

-Music created in BeepBox

-Sounds recorded irl and edited in Audacity

Thanks for playing!! :)
